Subject: Re: Triggerhappy's Lust

"Yeah, that's what I want, more kicking, less thinking" wilrider shouts, as
he Transforms to car mode and quickly accelerates to catch up. "Yeah thats
enough for me too" replies Drag Strip, quickly transforming and following.
"No, we need strategy, you metal mongrels" but Motormaster gave up. He knew
they couldnt be stoped by words. He turned around to see the small pink
cassete transform and grow into a metal gorrila. "Uhhhhh, Beastbox.....
reporting for uh duty" the robot exclaims looking up at Motormaster.
